author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Education Department has suspended a physical education teacher of the Government High School, Idayansathu after students complained of harassment.

According to a senior police official, the Superintendent of Police office had received an anonymous call from students of the school. The students complained that the physical education teacher was behaving “arrogantly” with students, and was “touching” girls during the PT classes.

Following this, the Child Protection Officer was informed, and an inquiry was initiated. . The Chief Educational Officer, Vellore was also informed, and a parallel inquiry was conducted.

A senior education official said inquiry revealed that the teacher had touched girl students inappropriately. The teacher had reportedly beaten up and verbally abused the students too.

“We have placed the teacher under suspension from Thursday,” R. Bhoopathy, CEO Vellore said.

When asked what followed the suspension, he said, “Suspension is not the punishment. It is done in the interest of students. We will frame charges on the teacher. We will conduct a detailed inquiry, and seek explanation from the teacher. Based on the outcome of the inquiry, appropriate action will be taken,” he said.
title: PE teacher suspended for harassing students
